response:
Subacute optic neuritis plus partial myelopathy implies central inflammatory demyelination; alternatives include antibody-mediated disorders and structural or granulomatous/infectious causes.

differential_diagnosis = ["Multiple Sclerosis (relapse)", "Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (AQP4-IgG positive)", "MOG Antibody-Associated Disease", "Compressive right thoracic hemicord lesion (e.g., extramedullary tumor/disc)", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Infectious myelitis/optic neuropathy (HIV, Syphilis, Lyme)"]
